amendment.description: Relating to the LHA Replacement Ship.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1398 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1398 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8653) Relating to the LHA Replacement Ship.
